name: launchdarkly-demo-app
description: A demonstration application showcasing LaunchDarkly Node.js SDK integration with Relay Proxy Enterprise

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/vendor && cp node_modules/launchdarkly-js-client-sdk/dist/ldclient.min.js public/vendor/ && cp node_modules/launchdarkly-js-client-sdk/dist/ldclient.min.js.map public/vendor/
